projects.name: JioImmerse
projects.description: A powerful XR platform that runs seamlessly on any smartphone, transforming it into a hub for immersive experiences. It serves as a unified micro-OS, integrating a launcher, App Store, and comprehensive Mixed Reality APIs within a single application.
highlights: Designed to power a diverse XR device ecosystem
Enables seamless compatibility across various headsets and smart glasses
All-in-one solution for AR, VR, and MR applications

projects.name: JioGlass
projects.description: State-of-the-art, lightweight mixed reality smart glass designed for an immersive media consumption experience and beyond. Whether for entertainment, remote collaboration, or enhanced learning, JioGlass offers high-resolution displays, 3D holographic interactions, and seamless connectivity.
highlights: High-resolution displays for immersive viewing
3D holographic interactions for intuitive control
Engineered for comfort and extended usage

projects.name: JioDive
projects.description: An affordable smartphone-powered VR headset that brings immersive experiences to the masses. With support for 360-degree videos, interactive VR gaming, and educational content, JioDive transforms any compatible smartphone into a gateway to virtual reality.
highlights: Support for 360-degree videos and interactive content
Compatible with most modern smartphones
Designed for accessibility and ease of use

projects.name: Jarvis Voice-to-Voice AI Home Assistant Engine
projects.description: Jarvis is a locally hosted voice-to-voice AI engine for home automation, enabling real-time, private, and intelligent conversations using high-performance GPU inference. It combines Large Language Models (LLMs) and speech pipelines to offer fully offline, low-latency interaction with IoT devices.
highlights: Real-time voice interaction powered by NVIDIA H100
Fully offline AI processing with vLLM, LLaMA and Whisper pipelines
Modular architecture with built-in IoT device control
